1: May the Lord answer you in times of trouble. May the God of Jacob protect you.
2: May he send you help from his Temple. May he support you from Mount Zion.
3: May he remember all your offerings. May he accept all your sacrifices. Selah
4: May he give you what you want. May all your plans succeed.
5: We will shout for joy when you succeed. We will raise a flag in the name of our God. May the Lord give you all that you ask for.
6: Now I know the Lord helps his appointed king. He answers him from his holy heaven. He saves him with his strong right hand.
7: Some trust in chariots, others in horses. But we trust the Lord our God.
8: They are overwhelmed and defeated. But we march forward and win.
9: Lord, save the king! Answer us when we call for help.
